p: Among patients with silent corticotroph tumors, significantly higher 24 h UFC level was observed in patients with USP8 mutations than in USP8wt patients (median 124.4 vs. 66.32, respectively; p = 0.0334). No difference in morning serum ACTH level, morning serum cortisol level, or midnight serum cortisol level were observed between these patients. We did not observe any difference between USP8mut and USP8wt patients in invasive growth status as determined with Knosp grading, proliferation index, or histological subtype (sparsely vs. densely granulated) either in the group of Cushingâ€™s disease patients or in those with silent tumors.
